name: Escape From House
descr:
[h2]The main character mysteriously gets into an unknown house. He is on his own. No one will come for him.[/h2]
[b]Escape From House is a first-person horror game. The game uses many mechanics with which the player will definitely feel the gloomy atmosphere of the game.

Game Features:[/b]

[list][li]Realistic graphics - detailed environment.
[/li][li]Physical engine - you can move and manipulate objects.
[/li][li]Atmosphere - incredibly realistic sounds.
[/li][li]Saving - you can save the game at any time.[/li][/list]
detail:
名称: Escape From House
类型: 动作, 冒险, 独立
开发商: AlphaDigital Development
发行商: AlphaDigital Development
发行日期: 2020年7月27日
review: 全部评测: 5 篇用户评测 - 需要更多用户评测来生成整体评价
sysreq:
Windows
最低配置:
操作系统: Windows 10
处理器: 2+ Ghz Intel/AMD Dual core or better
内存: 2 GB RAM
显卡: GeForce 260 1GB or AMD HD4850 1GB
存储空间: 需要 2 GB 可用空间

Mac OS X
最低配置:
操作系统: OS X 10.5 or later
处理器: 2+ Ghz Dual core or better
内存: 2 GB RAM
显卡: Shader Model 3.0 compatible videocard, 256 MB nVidia or ATI graphics card
存储空间: 需要 2 GB 可用空间

SteamOS + Linux
最低配置:
操作系统: Linux Ubuntu 10.04 or later
处理器: 2+ Ghz Dual core or better
内存: 2 GB RAM
显卡: Shader Model 3.0 compatible videocard, 256 MB nVidia or ATI graphics card
存储空间: 需要 2 GB 可用空间
